entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is introduced as someone who interrupted Harry. He is described as screaming and cowering in front of Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is introduced as a house-elf who takes a run at Mundungus with a saucepan. He is described as having great pale eyes and holding the pan aloft.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned by Harry as someone who never cared about any of the junk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who is questioning Mundungus. He is described as shouting at Kreacher to call him off.

relationships.description: Kreacher attacked Mundungus with a saucepan.
Harry is questioning Mundungus about the valuables he took from the house.
